action.action-desc: Ms. Castor of Florida submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: Expressing support for designation of July as National Sarcoma Awareness Month.

whereas.text: Whereas 1 percent of the cancers diagnosed in adults and 15 percent of cancers diagnosed in children each year are sarcoma;
Whereas more than 50 subtypes of sarcomas have been identified;
Whereas the National Cancer Institute recognizes that sarcoma is often misdiagnosed and underreported; and

Whereas July would be an appropriate month to designate as National Sarcoma Awareness Month to raise awareness of the disease and encourage more individuals to get properly diagnosed and treated: Now, therefore, be it

section.text: That the House of Representatives supports the designation of National Sarcoma Awareness Month.
